abstract: Sets the preferred audio data source for the port.
overview:
## Discussion

Call this method to request a change to the audio session’s preferred data source. To determine whether the change has taken effect, inspect the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSessionPortDescription/selectedDataSource] property. (For details, see Configuring standard audio behaviors in the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession] class reference).

If the port is in use, changing this setting is likely to result in a route reconfiguration.

Set a preferred data source only after setting the audio session’s category and mode, and activating the session.

# setPreferredDataSource(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the preferred audio data source for the port.

## Declaration

```swift
func setPreferredDataSource(_ dataSource: AVAudioSessionDataSourceDescription?) throws
```

## Parameters

- **dataSource**: The data source to use.

## Discussion

Call this method to request a change to the audio session’s preferred data source. To determine whether the change has taken effect, inspect the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSessionPortDescription/selectedDataSource] property. (For details, see Configuring standard audio behaviors in the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession] class reference).

If the port is in use, changing this setting is likely to result in a route reconfiguration.

Set a preferred data source only after setting the audio session’s category and mode, and activating the session.

## Managing a Port’s Data Sources

- **dataSources**: The available data sources for the port.
- **selectedDataSource**: The currently selected audio data source for the port.
- **preferredDataSource**: The preferred audio data source for the port.
